data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 1,707 believers in the state of Upper River.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Upper River, Gambia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 1,707 believers in Upper River, Gambia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 110 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Upper River, Gambia.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Upper River, Gambia not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Koina
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Koina, Upper River, Gambia.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Upper River, Gambia.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Upper River to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Upper River, Gambia has a population of 188,000.

We estimate Upper River has 1,707 people who might know Jesus, 5,122 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 181,172 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 110 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Upper River.

location.name: Upper River
location.cities_list: Basse Santa Su, Sabi, Koina, Diabugu, Daba Kunda
location.cities_list_w_pop: Basse Santa Su (14,380), Sabi (7,738), Koina (3,870), Diabugu (3,722), Daba Kunda (1,302)
